program: Master of Business Administration (MBA) — Daytime MBA (Fuqua)

sections.text: Fuqua’s Daytime MBA develops leaders who are analytical, collaborative, and purpose-driven, combining rigorous academics with a team-based culture.

items: Foundations of Management core in the first year
Extensive electives and concentrations (e.g., Strategy, Finance, Marketing)
Experiential learning via Fuqua Client Consulting Practicum and Global Academic Travel Experience
sections.text: Students begin with a core covering management fundamentals, then tailor second-year electives and applied experiences to career goals.

items: Completion of core and elective credits per Fuqua policy
Application with essays, recommendations, and transcripts
sections.text: Degree completion requires required core courses, electives, and leadership milestones as defined by Fuqua.
Graduates pursue roles across consulting, technology, finance, healthcare, and entrepreneurship with strong alumni and employer networks.
